title: Can (duo)
text:
Can (Korean: ìº”) is a South Korean male duo formed in 1998. Their members consist of Lee Jong-won and Bae Ki-sung. Can is currently signed to JJ Holic Media. Can released their first album, Version 1.0 on October 18, 1998.


== Discography ==


=== Albums ===
Version 1.0 (1998)
Genderless (2000)
Can with Piano (2001)
Gray Market (2003)
My Way (2005)
Old & New (2006)
Hot Summer Play (2007)
The 10th Anniversary - Variation (2008)
